steps.name: a JWT bearer token is generated
a request is prepared for creating an employee using json payload
a POST call is made to create the employee
the status code will be 201 for this call
the employee created contains key "Message" and value "Employee Created"
the employee id "Employee.employee_id" is stored as a global variable
